name: Zombie Warz
description:
Zombie Warz is a strategy survivor RTS with rogue-lite gameplay elements. Play as the king of a kingdom under siege by zombies and survive to discover their origins.

NOTE: Recommended to download the game if browser performance is an issue.

CONTROLS:

Movement: WSAD or Arrow keys

Build Loadout: R

Scroll Loadout: Q and E

Select units: Space

Slot units in resource: Space

Release units: Hold Space
